actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-619.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6337) to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to extend certain authorities relating to the international energy program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6337 (International Energy program).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6337) to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to extend certain authorities relating to the international energy program, and for other purposes.
